transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello. Hello. Hello. Good evening sir, main Shubhra baat kar rahi hun. Senior manager IndiaMART head office se. Avni se baat hui hogi aapki jo account manager hain.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Unki senior manager se baat kar rahi thi. Sir is group ke liye actually maine aapko connect kiya tha. Wo customer keh rahe the aap connect kar rahe the na sir. Actually mein services ko leke aur buyleads mein conversion nahi aa pa raha hai us cheez ko leke right. To matlab overall mein yahi kehna chahti thi sir aapse dekhiye abhi jaise ki Avni ne bhi aapko bataya hoga cheezon ko leke aur main bhi aapko bataun almost two months abhi hue nahi hone wale hain haan. Aap thik keh rahe hain 40 days hue hain lagbhag thik hai. Aur next cheez ye hai ki sir har buyleads mein bhi aisa hota hai ki wo aapko business nahi deti hai. Lekin isse aapki inquiry aur call badhti hain par inquiry aur call aapke business deti hain. Usme thoda aapko follow up karna padta hai customer se plus ek cheez ye bhi hai ki abhi aapka catalog new bana hai aap bhi jaante hain aur jab catalog matlab new bana nahi keh sakte hain but haan itna time to new hi samajh lijiye aap isko catalog ko to customer ka time dikhta hai waha pe one month se two months purana catalog ratings clear nahi kar rahi hain.
Customer: Abhi main, main to aap jaante hain main jaha par job kar raha tha abhi mera transfer hone wala hai. Man lijiye ki ho gaya hai.
Executive: Achcha okay. Okay.
Customer: Main, main doctor hun. Jaha par main yaha pe rehta tha abhi main transfer door hun, ho gaya hai. Hmm. To chitti aane mein baki hai sirf confirmation ke liye kahan par hua hai lekin yaha se dusra abhi main jo manufacturing hai main hath band kar dunga. Problem nahi ho raha hai.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: To agar wo speed ke liye tha to main kuch bhi kar sakta lekin abhi jo yaha par main ja raha hun to kya karunga abhi.
Executive: Aap kahan ja rahe hain?
Customer: Main abhi ja raha hun Kalahandi.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Jo yaha se kam kam se kam 450 se 500 kilometer distance hai yaha par, yaha se.
Executive: Matlab India mein hi reh rahe hain sir aap?
Customer: Main India nahi Odisha mein rahunga lekin to ye manufacturing company agar iske liye kya karu.
Executive: Aap kahin bhi location mein reh rahe hain usse kya fark padta hai sir aap deal to overall India kar hi sakte hain na. Usse kya fark padta hai humne to aapko pura hi diya hai na access ki aap pure India mein kisi bhi level pe deal kar sakte hain.
Customer: Jaha par main phone karta hun na ye sab kare hum aise inquiry ke liye kam se kam main abhi to main note down karke nahi rakhta lekin pehle se kahan par call kiya hun usko note down karke rakhta tha apne staff ko de deta tha usko follow up karo. Teen bar char bar follow up usko karte the. Lekin kuch nahi hum aise de diye the jinhone dal diya tha mere papa ki thik hai papa se bolunga. Aisa hote hote haan kya, kya karu. To abhi bhi staff se abhi bhi to aisa hi ho raha hai.
Executive: Itna to jyada bada sir kaam bhi nahi hai. Din ke 15 minute bhi nahi lagte hain. Aapne pichle mahine mein main aapko bataun aapke staff ne 13 din buyleads uthai hain. 13 din mein ek buyleads ko utha ke click karne mein dedh minute bhi lagta mushkil se. Application kholo, filter lagao aur contact kar lo. Uspe call laga lo aur aapka call ka jo talk time hai na.
Customer: Abhi yaha jyada filter bhi lagata hun na jab filter lagata hun to Odisha ka koi order nahi aata. Sab kuch bahar ka order aata hai. To jo bahar ka order aata hai wo to bolta hai are itne door se hum aapke transport ka kharcha kaun dega.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Jab main filter karta hun.
Executive: Odisha ka abhi cow dung cake ka aur raw incense stick ka to show ho raha hai.
Customer: Nahi wo sab Odisha ka message kar raha hun. Hmm. Main Bhuvaneshwar se baat kar raha hun. Ha wo sab waha par mujhe dikha raha hai ki wo aapka khud seller hai. Ab maje ki baat ye pehle bol chuka hun Avni ji ko ki jo bhi hum jisko phone kar rahe hain aur mere paas jo phone aa rahe hain wo seller to seller ye aapka B to B na S to S ho gaya hai. Seller to seller contact. Wo log bol rahe hain bhai aap bech rahe hain. Main kaha haan bech raha hun na hum bechna chahte hain. Aap kharidege maine kaha main aapse kyun kharidu main to khud ka manufacturing hai.
Executive: Sir manufacturing wale ke liye wholesaler wala banda to sir customer hi hua na maje wo bhi sale kar hi raha hai. Manufacturer kar rahe hain aap koi banda wholesale mein kar raha hai jo distribution mein kaam kar raha hai.
Customer: Wo bhi wo bhi manufacturing kar rahe hain. Jo sab naye naye hain sab sir yaha pe jud gaye hain. Hmm.
Executive: Yaha pe jud gaye. To kisi ko bhi aapne apna nature of business na yaha pe dala hua nahi hai ki aap manufacturer hain ya retailer hain wholesaler hain. To aisa hota hai ki calls aati hain ek baar nature of business update kara dijiye aap. Isse kya rahega ki baki sab log check kar payenge kyunki man lijiye agar aap aise person hain thik hai jo ki deal kar rahe hain manufacturing ke liye to wholesaler wale ka wholesaler wala banda aapka customer banega.
Customer: Thik hai aap aap jitna bhi service rehta hai aapka wo do mahine ka aapka at least koi baat nahi. To ab maine aapka service sun liya hai aapka ho gaya to baki agar mujhe thoda sa bhi bahut achcha hota main aur kisi ko transfer karke na karwa do bhai karne mein aapka nuksan karunga. Agar nahi wo wali cheez nahi hai na sir agar mujhe lag raha hota ya fir main apni lagne ki baat nahi keh rahi hun ya fir aapka business ka loss ka kuch mujhe lagta bhi ya dikh raha hota to samajh aata mujhe buyleads bhi aap consume kar rahe hain thik hai check inquiries bhi aa rahi hain ab to call bhi aana start ho gayi uske bavajud bhi cheh saat call aayi hain aapko abhi is mahine mein November mein last bhi do call aayi hain abhi ye visibility aur boost up continuously use karne se.
Customer: Call aa rahe hain lekin uska kya ho raha hai itna koi sab bol rahe hain ki hume bechna hai. To akhir dar kharidega kaun?
Executive: Wo wali cheez ho jati hai na sir ki ek manufacturer ke liye wholesaler jo hai wo customer hai IndiaMART pe bahut sare customer aise hain jo khud seller hain. Ab har koi aisa banda hoga nahi kyunki dekhiye agar aap koi cheez sale kar rahe hain aapko bhi kal ko koi aur cheez saree kapda kuch kharidna hoga to aap bhi to kisi se kharidege hi na aur jabki aap bhi kaam kar rahe hain.
Customer: Thik hai aap aisa kar sakte hain aap jo cow dung ka vagera ka koi do deal mujhe waha se convince karwa ke Odisha ka mujhe deal aa sakta hai. Do deal main jyada nahi kar raha bulk amount ka.
Executive: Aap sir do kya aap follow kijiye aapki jyada bhi deal convert ho sakti hain usme koi wo thodi hai uske liye thoda work to aapko karna padega na sir. Usme work to karna padega staff to baithi hui hai karne ke liye.
Customer: Staff to baithi hui hai to kar rahe hain to din bar char bar follow karte hain kab follow kiya mujhe call nahi dikha raha hai ki haan hum ye ye call lagne hum usko kar rahe hain. To agar wo ho raha hai to do deal mujhe karwa dijiye koi baat nahi mera paisa aa jayega.
Executive: Sir jab aapne services li thi to aapne ye thodi na kaha tha ki koi bhi do deal karwa dena mujhe main paise de de raha hun. Aapko to ye bola gaya hoga na ki services use karni padegi aur main aapko samjha rahi hun aur bata rahi hun sir ki use karke hi aapko aayega. Suniye sir main aapki cheeze samajh rahi hun aapne investment kari hai aapko apna return chahiye paisa chahiye thik hai haan thik hai lekin uske liye sir aapko work karna padega. Aap soch rahe hain ki maine 12 mahine ka paisa diya hai aur payment di hui hai aur do mahine mein hi agar aap is tarah se mujhse bolenge ki aapko business aa jaye to us tarike se to nahi aa payega na sir use to karna hi padta hai. Cheezon ko handle to karna hi padta hai.
Customer: 11 11 mahine ya mein aayega na kya?
Executive: Aisa kuch nahi hai sir main keval aapko itna keh rahi hun catalog naya bana hai visibility abhi boost bhi hui hai aapki aap bhi buyleads ko follow kar rahe hain kafi sare teen tarike se bhi aapko itne sare customer mil rahe hain usme thoda deal convert ho sakti hai sir.
Customer: Jo bhi mujhe, jo bhi mujhe pehle bolte thik hai aapko company ko Odisha Odisha mein hum char number tak pahunchane kya haan ye hamara hum karenge hum uske aapka to by log IndiaMART mein aapka ye wo shayad live ho gaya hai aapko hum char number char number tak pahuncha denge hum aapka deal hum karwa payenge. Aisa to mujhe bola gaya tha aur agar nahi hota to hum paisa return denge confidence bhi denge agar aapko agar aapke paas executive ka recording rehta hai to usko zara sun lijiye.
Executive: Hum to wo recording vagera nahi rakhte.
Customer: Thik hai aap madam aise dekhiye aap kya kar sakte hain. Dekhiye fir hum aap kal hum baat kar sakte hain. Aap aap bhi company ke employee hain main to customer hun abhi koi nok jhok nahi hai aap dekh lijiye kya hota hai main bhi buyleads consume karta hun fir phone karta hun aap to 27 tarikh ko hai do teen din time hai abhi tak hath mein dekh lijiye. Hmm.
Executive: Bilkul sir main aapko in cheezon ke bare mein batati hun kya hai kya nahi hai aur rahi baat aapki to aapne jab business kiya hoga ya fir services start ki hogi return ke liye to nahi ki hogi business grow karne ke liye ki hogi deal ke liye ki hogi ab agar aap us cheez ko ye dekh rahe hain ki use kar rahe hain aur uske bavajud bhi jab agar hum aapko guidance de rahe hain aap uske according kariye fir agar aapko problem aati hai to hum baithe hain aapko guide karne ke liye help karne ke liye pehli bar mein thodi success ho jata hai sir.
Customer: Ab mujhe do mahine mein nahi aayega teen mahine bhi nahi aayega char mahine bhi nahi aayega cheh mahine bhi nahi aayega to main kya karu.
Executive: Sir aise thodi hota hai ab aap ek cheez bas batao itne sare customers mein aap baat karoge deal karoge to kaise nahi convert hoga aap ye bhi to dekho kya price de rahe ho kis location mein dekh rahe ho kis tarah se kya baat ho rahi hai sale ho pa rahi hai nahi ho pa rahi hai.
Customer: Main wahi keh raha hun aap Odisha location mein kahan ye abhi opportunity nahi mujhe main filter lagata hun Odisha mein kahin par sab seller baithe hue hain.
Executive: Aapko main aapko dikhati hun na sir Odisha location ka aap keh rahe hain raw incense stick cow dung cake ki aa rahi hain aap ek bar kholiye main aapko dikhati hun buyleads aapki bhi IndiaMART pe samajh mein.
Customer: Thik hai wo buyleads aap mujhe send kar dijiye main unse baat kar lunga. Aapko ek number mein.
Executive: Buyleads aapke account pe aa rahi hain aapke account pe aa rahi hain wo buyleads aap account kholiye aapke paas hain sab.
Customer: Agni ji ko bol dijiye thoda wo pehchan mein nazar mein rahe hain unko jo jo hain Odisha ka unko thoda filter karke mujhe bhejne bol dijiye. Unko bol dijiye kal mujhe bhejne ke liye main kal bhi baat kar lunga.
Executive: Sir buyleads aapko show ho rahi hain sir suno buyleads show ho rahi hain ek bari aap handle karoge employee karega kaun karega ek bar mujhe bataiye to main video arrange karati hun video meeting aap baith jaiye hum bhi baith jate hain main aapko bata deti hun kahan se kaise filter laga ke buyleads leni hai fir unpe follow up karna hai.
Customer: Thik hai madam dekhiye abhi mera employee abhi accident ho gaya abhi uske liye main dawai leke ja raha hun wo ja raha hai aapka packet deliver karne accident hua hai raste mein usko abhi usko dawai deta hun fir main kal se aapko baat aap se baat karunga kal okay.
Executive: Kal kal kitne baje baat karenge aap?
Customer: Main kal to mujhe aisa bolna hai ki kal main free nahi rahunga kal parson main apne pitaji ko hospital leke jana hai yahi yaha se jaane se pehle to main free rahunga shaniwar ko to aap agar aapke mobile mein application agar hai to main aapko bata deti hun abhi ek bar aap khol lijiye.
Executive: To main bas thoda sa bhi batana hai main aapko bata deti hun do minute bhi nahi lagenge.
Customer: Nahi abhi to hum 10 minute baad kuch us uske liye. Hey friends. Thoda pani bottle la lo. Haan. Haan. Hello. Abhi unko dawai dena hai abhi chalo. Abhi unko dawai dena hai abhi abhi main thoda wo rakhta hun phone. Thik hai koi baat nahi paise ke bare mein koi baat nahi abhi main rakhta hun. Haan lo. Hmm. Medicine khai ho medicine. Hmm. Medicine khai hona chahiye. Ye ye ye bhi mat tumhara fever vagerah thik chalo.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer's buyleads are not converting into sales.

- Feels calls are from sellers, not buyers.

- Transferring jobs, will close manufacturing unit.

- Wants deals specifically from Odisha.



Resolution:

- Executive explained how to use filters.

- Executive offered a video meeting to explain process.

- Executive stated that they do not keep call recordings.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will follow up with the customer.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Annoyed -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, location, filters, follow up
